text:
New Generation Of FRIENDS Fans Confuse Matt LeBlanc For Joey's Dad & He Just Shoos Them Away!
New Generation Of FRIENDS Fans Confuse Matt LeBlanc For Joey's Dad & He Just Shoos Them Away!
You might feel like it was only a few years ago that you watched FRIENDS when it aired TV, but it has actually been 24 long years since the first season of the much-loved American sitcom premiered. Just like we laughed and cried with all these characters, we also grew old with them.
via GIPHY
If you still can’t believe that and need proof that you’ve grown old, let Matt LeBlanc AKA Joey Tribbiani from FRIENDS tell you an incident that reminds him of his age too.
via GIPHY
The 51-year-old actor recently appeared on the show LIVE with Kelly and Ryan and reminisced about the old days when he played the iconic character on FRIENDS that aired from 1994 to 2004. Now that show is streaming on Netflix, the young generation is also watching it,” said the host Ryan Seacrest. To this, Matt LeBlanc had an interesting story to narrate.
“I was walking down the street one day, this was a few years ago. This kid, he must have been 13, 14, he's like, 'Oh my god, you're Joey's dad!'
And, my response was 'Scram! Like an old guy would say.”
FRIENDS is simply one of the best shows ever made. And it'll never get old. Will it?

description: Matt LeBlanc AKA Joey Tribbiani says new generation of FRIENDS fans confuse him for Joey's dad. “I was walking down the street one day, this was a few years ago, this kid, he must have been 13, 14, he's like, 'Oh my god, you're Joey's dad!' And, my response was 'Scram! Like an old guy would say.”
